Reviews.Title: Good phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Shanie
Reviews.Content: Well, I am not a huge fan of the touch screen smartphones etc.. I had recently purchased a Samsung Gravity 3 like two months ago, and after dropping the thing my screen was messed up, it had squiggly lines all over the screen and the screen would freeze on me and rather then going through t-mobile customer support I decided to just shop around and I fell in love with the look and colour of this phone.I was really suprised at how fast i recieved this phone! Before the G3 I had, I had a nokia nuron which was a NIGHTMARE DUMBPHONE! All I wanted was a simple phone. Well, I am IN LOVE with this phone so far.. The look, the colour, the screen, it's not heavy nor bulky!The camera actually has a flash..and it's a 5.0mp camera..T-mobile has offered different data plans, and I got the 10 dollar plan for 200MB of data which is fine for me because i dont use data very much but I went on the web on the phone and its actually pretty decent.. It beats the nuron by a long shot.. Texting is very easy.. You can text using qwerty. Phone calls are clear as day.. You can also use it as a MP3 player.. This phone came with a USB cord to upload music, haven't tried doing that yet! But all in all, I am really liking it and I rate the phone a 10!*~*Update*~*Had this phone for awhile now, the camera SUCKS!!!!!!! The flash is bright.. It doesn't take clear and clean photo's. It kind of distorts the colour a bit... I tried going into my camera settings and switching some things around.. It helped a little bit, I have taken flash off it helped some what, but it still distorts the colour of the image and it takes forever for the pic to be taken.. Also you have to go into settings on camera everytime you wanna take a pic to change them, no option to save changes, that kinda sucks... But I am not gonna down grade my rating because of the camera, it's not something I use all the time... Other then that, I STILL LOVE the phone :-)Oh and I have used the MP3 player on the phone... I LOVE it.. you can use the music you upload on your phone as ringtones... Its awesome..Also, for those with the myfaves plan, this is a myfaves phone just incase anyone was wondering.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Sky Diva
Reviews.Content: The phone works perfect. The only thing is that it seems like I was given a very weak battery. It goes dead really fast. So I have to go out and purchase another battery. Other then that the phone works great.

Reviews.Title: Most annoying phone ever!!
Reviews.Author: marina
Reviews.Content: When I first bought this phone, problems were already arising. Every time I receive a phone call, my screen is black, does not show who is calling. It'll say your text has been sent, but the receiver will tell you they didn't receive anything. When the texts actually do send, the texts are combined with previous messages from months ago. This phone is messed up in every single way. I do not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Gives a blank screen at startup
Reviews.Author: Jon Jeffries
Reviews.Content: Gives a blank screen at startup and only had it for two weeks! Heed the reviews of everyone else who's had problems with this phone and don't buy.

Reviews.Title: Not for me
Reviews.Author: Josefin Wede
Reviews.Content: I was dissappointed with this phone. It said it has a full qwerty-keyboard but has the old keyboard with 3-4 letters per number button.The touchscreen is a bit slow too so you need to press pretty hard for it to react.I did not get a charger with the phone, which I guess wasn't false marketing since nothing was mentioned about it but I thought that was standard.If possible I will send this phone back, I did not like it at all.

Reviews.Title: Way below expectations based on descriptions
Reviews.Author: Angela S
Reviews.Content: Both my daughter and I were under the impression it was a more recent model and a data phone that would take apps. I could have paid $30 for this on Craigslist.org for the same thing instead of 140.00 The description was highly misleading and gave limited information. We won't be buying any more phones from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Phone Good Battery Not!
Reviews.Author: Vee
Reviews.Content: If you buy this phone, please order a new battery at the same time of purchase, you are going to need it!  The telephone comes in generic packaging so I can only assume it is not quite new.  The battery that comes with the phone is definitly not new the battery life is so bad it is frustrating.  The battery that came with my phone did'nt even hold a charge for a full day, the phone kept power off.  I like the phone itself, it is a good first time touch screen users.  I was a little afraid of the new technology android phones, plus they are way more expensive.  The phone did delivery fast, my major complaint is the battery life.  I contacted the seller about the dead battery, but have not hear from them.  I am now ordering a new battery off of amazon, I hope this solves the problem.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Behold!
Reviews.Author: Megz
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone a couple days ago. I got it much quicker then expected. The phone was however not working prperly when I got it. The screen wouldn't turn on when anyone called or when I made phone calls. I emailed the company and told them and they gladly are going to exchange it for me. So as far as customer service goes their great! and besides the screen not lighting up which im sure is a defect it is an awesome phone. I will update when I get my new one back.

Reviews.Title: T919 behold Cell phone
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I sincerely love my new phone.  It came in quick and was i great condition and works great!  Thank you and i am really happy! :)

Reviews.Title: T-moobile Samsung Behold t919
Reviews.Author: PrettyGurl
Reviews.Content: I like this phone a lot, especially because its pink and it's very light and thin. Not ur latest phone but i still like it. very good price for and awesome condition with fast delivery. =)

Reviews.Title: Great Phone. Looks & Works Well :-)
Reviews.Author: Andriy
Reviews.Content: I used this phone for 3 years. Never had any problems. I would recommend it to other people. The only problem is that it does not have wifi.

Reviews.Title: samsung T919 behold
Reviews.Author: taf
Reviews.Content: battery have problem donot hold charge for long.I charged for 2hours like i do always with new phone. Beside the battery the phone is in good condetion.I will recomend this product for people like to use phone just to make regular call no internate.

Reviews.Author: Bellamatus1987
Reviews.Content: i LOVE IT! i honestly thought it wasnt going to be all that great but delivery was fast and great packaging i will continue to purchase from here //thanks again guys! the phone was perfect condition i love it!!!! =))

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: hannah7487
Reviews.Content: After buying this phone, within a week it would cut off and own... Plus now after like 3months the touchscreen part on the phone doesnt work and when i tryed to get my money back amazon has this policy after 30 days the merchane wont give a refund or exchange smh, im never buy a cell phone from amazon or any of the third party merchanes again..

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
Slim touchscreen phone for full web browsing and multimedia playback, compatible with 1700/2100 3G network
5-megapixel camera/camcorder, Bluetooth stereo music streaming
microSD expansion to 16 GB, access to personal e-mail and instant messaging
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 288 hours (12 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung T919 Behold T-Mobile Pink
